about_the_game:
Stellar Insurgency is a single-player, 3D, Open World, space game with rts and rpg elements. Explore a galaxy of 300 systems as you control your fleet in a top-down 3D style, navigating through Star-lanes, Warp gates, and Black holes. Customize and upgrade your fleet, complete missions, trade, hire your crew, wage war and determine the fate of the galaxy in this grand sim saga. This is the demo of the main game. In this demo you are confined in the initial solar system.



Full Game Major Features

  • Explore a galaxy of 300 systems controlling your fleet in a 3D top-down style.
  • Three playable Factions plus three additional.
  • Cross the galaxy through Star-lanes, Warp gates and Black holes.
  • Customize and upgrade your fleet consisting from Fighters to Carriers and Battleships.
  • Complete missions that impact your relations with galaxy’s factions.
  • Forge alliances, wage war and determine the fate of the galaxy.
  • Hire crew to improve the stats of your fleet.
  • Be a pirate (if you want to).
  • Make profit through trade.

]Full Game Minor Features

  • Explore stellar objects through exploration probes.
  • Three levels of defense Stealth, Shields and Armor prior to component and hull damage.
  • Use warp drive to jump locally and through solar systems.
  • Board Enemy vessels through boarding probes or transporters.
  • Several classes of weapons that include, laser-turrets, beams, missiles, flak (anti-fighter).
  • Place or avoid mine fields.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K, AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 3-button mouse with wheel, keyboard and speakers

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 3-button mouse with wheel, keyboard and speakers
